subject: Suits and Litigation
Madison Square Garden
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan testified on Tuesday in the sexual harassment lawsuit filed by Anucha Browne Sanders that he believed it was better to offer her financial training than fire her.
snippet: James L. Dolan testified on Tuesday in the sexual harassment lawsuit filed by Anucha Browne Sanders that he believed it was better to offer her financial training than fire her.
